title: Payment double charge
chunk_text: If you were charged twice, follow refund process and contact support with transaction id.

title: Password reset
chunk_text: To reset your password, click forgot password and follow instructions. If you don't receive email, check spam.

title: Order tracking
chunk_text: If your order is not updating, check courier tracking or raise a shipping ticket with order id.

title: Refund status
chunk_text: Refunds typically take 5-7 business days. If you were charged and no refund is visible after 7 days, provide transaction id and bank statement to the support team.

title: Coupon not applying
chunk_text: Coupons may be limited to certain SKUs or time windows. Verify coupon terms and expiry. If coupon meets requirements but still fails, send the coupon code and cart details to support.

title: Account locked
chunk_text: If your account is locked after multiple failed logins, wait 30 minutes and try again. If lock persists, use account recovery or contact support with your registered email.

title: Return policy
chunk_text: Items can be returned within 14 days if unopened. Start a return request from the order page, print the return label, and drop the package at the nearest courier point.

title: Payment method issues
chunk_text: If your card is declined, confirm card details, CVV, and that the bank is allowing online transactions. Try an alternate card or UPI. If changes occurred despite failure, share a screenshot of the payment attempt.
